name: Sombrero Guy
description:
Flame Flicker Interactive:
We are a group of artists and programmers, whose aim is to develop our abilities in creating games. We focus on making computer and mobile games. Flame Flicker Interactive has existed for over nearly two years now (15th March 2019), and during that time we’ve been working on five different projects. Occasionally we take part in Game Jams and other smaller projects.


Discord Server: https://discord.gg/cHgTYYttzM
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/flameflickerinteractive/
